=====
JSDoc
=====

JSDoc Module
============

Comprehensive documentation for the JavaScript components of the project. Each module is detailed to provide insights into its purpose and functionality.

Modules Overview
----------------

- **Chat Module**  
  Manages real-time messaging and user interactions.  
  `Read more <js.chat.html>`_

- **Chat Sidebar Navbar**  
  Sidebar navigation for the chat interface, enabling seamless navigation between chats.  
  `Read more <js.chat_side_navbar.html>`_

- **Admin Panel**  
  Tools for managing users, monitoring activity, and accessing dashboard functionality.  
  `Read more <js.admin.html>`_

- **Review Module**  
  Supports review submission, rating functionality, and the display of user feedback.  
  `Read more <js.review.html>`_

- **Index Module**  
  Manages the homepage functionality, including dynamic content rendering, user interactions, and navigation setup.   
  `Read more <js.index.html>`_

Modules
-------

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 4

   js.chat
   js.chat_side_navbar
   js.admin 
   js.review
   js.index
